FaceNormalDeviation: Convert based on Angle Tolerance between Face Normals
FindPolygons: Create Polygroups by merging triangle pairs into Quads
FromUVIslands: Create PolyGroups based on UV Islands
FromNormalSeams: Create PolyGroups based on Hard Normal Seams
FromConnectedTris: Create Polygroups based on Connected Triangles
FromFurthestPointSampling: Create Polygroups centered on well-spaced sample points, approximating a surface Voronoi diagram
